about_the_game: Bonerdale is a graphic point and click game that features hidden objects, dialogue choices and minigames that help you, the player, explore the beautiful suburban town of Bonerdale. Meet its lovable and sexy residents while you and your friends are trying to find a job and uncover the mystery of the murders that are taking place in the town. The player can explore more than a dozen locations and items to point and click to. Explore the quirks of even more characters to talk to through choose your own adventure text format and minigames to overcome. The development team republishes the game after putting the project on hold due to conflicting schedules and personal drawbacks. Some of the original members are back, and we are looking forward to completing 'Bonerdale'!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is thematically surrounded around sex. 

There are fellatio scenes, sex scenes and multiple instances of nudity. There are exhibitionism scenes that involve glipses of semi-nudity or explicit nudity.

There is a lot of explicit dialogue about sexual acts and innuendos.  

There are NO scenes depicting sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug abuse, or self-harm. There is a scene where the player has to collect beers but no beers are explicitly shown to be consumed. 

There is also dialogue involving the description of unsolved murders and the details around them.

The player can explore more than a dozen locations and items to point and click to. Explore the quirks of even more characters to talk to through choose your own adventure text format and minigames to overcome. The development team republishes the game after putting the project on hold due to conflicting schedules and personal drawbacks. Some of the original members are back, and we are looking forward to completing 'Bonerdale'!

short_description: Stroll around the beautiful suburban town of Bonerdale. Meet its lovable and sexy residents while you and your friends are trying to find a job and uncover the mystery of the murders that are taking place in the town.
